name.japanese: ガレーラカンパニー本社

description: The headquarters of the Galley-La Company, the premier shipbuilding company in Water 7. Iceburg's bedroom is located on the upper floor of this building.

keyEvents.title: CP9 Deduces Franky is Cutty Flam
keyEvents.description: In Iceburg's bedroom, Rob Lucci reveals his deduction that Franky is actually the supposedly dead Cutty Flam, holder of the Pluton blueprints.
keyEvents.significance: The location where one of the arc's major revelations occurs.

keyEvents.title: CP9 Explains Their True Purpose
keyEvents.description: Lucci reveals CP9's true nature as a secret government assassination unit in Iceburg's room.
keyEvents.significance: The setting for major exposition about CP9 and the World Government's intentions.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats and Paulie Break Into Iceburg's Room
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates and Paulie crash through the walls to reach Iceburg's bedroom and confront CP9.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the beginning of the direct confrontation between the Straw Hats and CP9.

keyEvents.title: First Demonstration of Rokushiki
keyEvents.description: Rob Lucci demonstrates Shigan and Tekkai for the first time in this location.
keyEvents.significance: The site where the Straw Hats first witness CP9's superhuman abilities.

keyEvents.title: Robin Declares She's Leaving
keyEvents.description: Robin shocks the crew by declaring she's leaving the Straw Hat Pirates in Iceburg's bedroom.
keyEvents.significance: The location of one of the most heartbreaking moments in the Water 7 Arc.

keyEvents.title: Lucci Announces the Mansion Will Burn
keyEvents.description: Lucci announces that the building will be set ablaze in two minutes to destroy evidence.
keyEvents.significance: Adds urgency and danger to the confrontation.

statusHistory.reason: Set on fire by CP9 to destroy evidence

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel gifted to them by Kaya. Currently docked at Water 7 in a damaged state.

keyEvents.title: Franky Watches Usopp Repair the Ship
keyEvents.description: Franky observes from a distance as Usopp desperately attempts to repair the Going Merry, despite the ship being beyond saving.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the deteriorating condition of the Going Merry and foreshadows the conflict over the ship's fate.

statusHistory.reason: Severely damaged from various adventures, particularly after Sky Island. Keel is broken.
